Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

8GB RAM 256GB SSD

8GB LPDDR4X memory, 256GB SSD high-speed storage lets you use very smoothly in daily work. What’s more, GemiBook supports Sata protocal 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB, realizing massive space.

2K Resolution IPS Screen

13in 2K resolution IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear, 3:2 The aspect ratio of the screen, can expand the vertical space of the screen, and can display more content.

it has a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency.

Backlit Keyboard & Narrow Bezel

Chuwi GemiBook windows laptop houses a narrow-bezel 13”FHD IPS , Features a backlit keyboard which makes you work comfortably in dark environment.

Ultra-light and Ultra-thin

The body of this traditional Laptop computers is made of light alloy and weighs only 2.95 pounds. Sharing and callaborating is even easier with 180° hinge and 170° wide viewing angle.

High Speed Wireless Connection

CHUWI GemiBook laptop computer Intel Wireless-AC 7265 Wireless module supports 2.4G /5G dual-bandandthe top speed can reach 867Mbps, providing a more smooth Wireless network experience.

this windows 10 laptop adopts 38Wh high-capacity lithiumion battery, battery life up to 8 hours, which is enough for a whole day’s use. support upgrade to Windows 11 Home .

【High Performance Processor】- CHUWI GemiBook windows laptop powered by Intel Celeron J4125 processor, frequency up to 2.7GHz, 4 cores 4 threads, powerful operation without lagging make your device runs smoothly for daliy work and entertainment, preferred for business office or student. support upgrade to windows 11.
【13in 2K resolution IPS Display 】- GemiBook 13 inch laptop computer with 2K resolution FHD IPS screen, both text and pictures are clear. 3:2 The aspect ratio can expand the vertical space of the screen which can display more content, bring you a comfortable visual experience and higher efficiency when browsing web pages or documents.
【Large Capacity Storage】- This Win 10 Laptop with 8GB RAM(LPDDR4X), 256GB high-speed SSD, let you use smoothly without stuck even with multiple programs opened. supports NVMe 2280 SSD expansion to 1TB and TF card expansion to 512GB, realizing massive space for most complex software run efficient.
【Premium Portable Design】- This traditional Laptop computer made of magnesium-alloy weighs only 2.82 pounds, has excellent portability. Adopts 180°hinge makes sharing and ollaborating much easier. Equipped with a full size backlit keyboard and large trackpad, which provide a more convenient typing experience and ensuring visibility even in the dark.
【Longer Battery Life】- GemiBook home laptop pc adopts 38Wh lithium-ion battery which life up to 8H enough for daliy use. Equipped with full function USB-C, supports video or data transmission and PD2.0 fast charging. In addition, there are many interfaces such as USB-A 3.0*1，3.5mm headphone jack, M.2 SSD extension, Micro-SD, etc.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);

var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);

var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

);

Product Description

Compatible Laptops

appr. 4 lbs (more stable)

appr. 2 lbs
appr. 5 lbs

Key Features
Heavy & Stable
Minialist & Adjustable
Minimalist
Sit to Stand Working

Suit for any laptop 10 to 15.6 inches – The laptop stand fits all laptops 10 to 15.6 inches, such as notebooks PC computers 10 inches, 11 inches, 12 inches, 13 inches, 13.3 inches, 14 inches, 15 inches, 15.4 inches, 15.6 inches, etc.
Sturdy and portable – The office computer stand is totally made of thickened aluminum alloy, so the stand is sturdier and has less wobbly. The rubber on the holder hands sticks tightly and ensure your laptop stable on the stand. And the rubber feet prevent the stand from slipping on your desktop. Moreover, the stand is detachable and easy to install without tools, so the lightweight laptop stand is really portable.
Ergonomic design – The slim compact stand elevates your laptop by 6-inch to a perfect eye level and prevents you from hunching over your screen, which reduces neck and shoulder pain. Moreover, the edge of the stand is so smooth that protects you from being scratched.
Cooling better and keep desktop organized – The ventilated elevator desk stand only has two holder hands but not a whole flat, so there is more space to enable the heat to vent and keep your notebook computer from overheating. Also, you can organize your office items such as keyboard and mouse under the thin stand.
Detachable and simple installation – The laptop stand can be conveniently disassembled into 3 parts. And You can easily reassemble it again easily.


SOUNDANCE

Let’s Enjoy Healthier Work Style!

Warranty & Support

Price: $35.99 - $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:29 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Powered by the wave of Smart Home, we are keen to linking every of our DIY lovers with smart tools in a simple manner.

Our vision is to empower the imagnation through continuous innovation of our technology!

GoGonova Hot Glue Gun&Heat Gun

DIYer’s Choices

Multi-purposed Tool

【3 Adjustable Speeds】- GoGonova cordless rotary tool can realize 3 variable speeds (5000/12000/18000 RPM), it allows you to adjust and control the polishing speed precisely to meet the power of different scenarios, making your artwork DIY creation a quite easy thing. With different materials like wood, soft metal, plastic, stone, the miracle creation is right on your hands!
【Ergonomic & Compact Design】- Amazingly compact size and rubber wrapped around the body makes the tool easy to grip and control. The keyless chuck promise a simple and tool-free replacement. This makes them perfect not only for a wide range of household tasks, including repairs and maintenance, but also for crafting and hobbies. There are even rotary tool attachments designed to care for pets’ toenails.
【Overload Protection】- The tool body is designed with several vent holes, which helps to dissipate the heat continuously for longer time using. Moreover, the overload protection system would stop the motor in case of unanticipated situations. The groove power button design of this rotary tool help you get rid of worrying about stopping the rotating by touching the switch accidentally.
【ALL-IN-ONE With 43 Accessories】- One little tool for multiple purposes! This rotatory tool come with 43 accessories is perfect for a variety of light-duty handy works. Grinding, polishing, curving, sanding, engraving and more light projects, all your need is this convenient all-in-one tool.
【Fantastic Deal】- 1 x GoGonova 4V Cordless Rotatory Tool; 1 x Storage Box; 43 x Accessories; 1 x USB-C Cable; 1 x Manual.
** KIND REMINDER – This cordless rotary tool is designed for LIGHT-DUTY works only.

  • 15* Sanding Paper & 8* Sanding Bands
  • 5* Cut for Wheels
  • 5* Grinding Stones
  • 5* Diamond Wheel Points
  • 1* Mandrel for Sanding Bands & 1* Mandrel for Cut-off Wheel
  • 1* Hss Cutter, 1* Steel Brush
  • 1* Felt Tip With Shank
  • 1* USB-C Charging Cable

GoGonova 4V Rotary Tool

Why do users stick with GoGonova?

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Our vision is to empower the imagination through continuous innovation of our technology.

  • Light Weight – 1.2 lbs
  • 3 Speed Adjustments – Up to 18,000 RPM
  • Ergonomic Design – Comfortable Grip
  • Ventilation Mechanism – Smooth Using Experience
  • Multi-Purpose – Kit with 43 accessories available for grinding, engraving, cutting, polishing, sanding, cleaning and more!

Lengthen your look in two-tone. Lucky Brand’s graduated paddle earrings are crafted in gold-tone and silver-tone mixed metal. Approximate drop: 2-1/2 inches.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.1 x 3.55 x 0.35 inches; 0.15 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ JLRU9829
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 21, 2014
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Lucky Brand
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00GXO0P3O
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Fishhook backings
Imported

About us

Lucky Brand was founded in 1990 with a spirit of reinvention. Rooted in premium denim, Americana and self expression, our brand is for the free– thinkers and the optimists who don’t take life too seriously. For those who say, “take-me-as-I-am. Or don’t. It’s cool.” In the beginning we experimented with vintage jeans, remixing the classic to create something new. Now we make denim AND lifestyle wares. Call it eclectic Americana for all. Our products portray personality through perfectly imperfect, often American-heritage inspired details that bring levity to any look, or situation. Lucky Brand brings The Luckening – that sweet thing that happens during a blah day that reminds you there’s always a lighter view. We know great fitting jeans won’t change your life, but maybe they can make you feel a little luckier.

Superior Value Oscillating Saw Blades kit–20 Pcs contain 6 different kinds of saw blades, for cutting wood, metal plastic and other materials, each type of saw blade is specific for a particular purpose. Our oscillating saw blades can meet a variety of needs, which could be used for workshop ,household or other place.
Tougher and Thicker Than Most–Made of alloy steel and high carbon steel , our oscillating multitool blades are manufactured with special techniques and thick gauge metals due to which it becomes durable for a long period.
Special Design for Precision cutting–Built-in length markers on two sides, one side is inch and other is centimeter, ensure you can get accurate cuts easy and fast while you working with it. 2 kinds of special design precision saw blades have longer wavy tooth that is specifically designed to provide faster, cleaner cuts in wood and plastic.
Universal Compatible System–Our quick release saw blades are compatible with many oscillating tools in the market, such as Fein Multimaster, Ryobi, Milwaukee, Hitachi, Black & Decker, Chicago, Craftsman and More

Product description CMWDG Wood Carving Drill Bits 20Pcs Set Unlike Any Other:The solid tungsten carbide burr set gives you a massive selection of shapes for all types of cuts, It will leave a smoother finish than single cut burrs due to producing smaller chips as they cut away the material. Used for medium-light stock removal, deburring, finishing, and cleaning. ★Carbide Burr Material:wood carving bits are made from highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand up to time. Package: 20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this rotary grinder burr bit set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping. Box Size: 2.51”x1.73”x0.78” ★ Multi-Purpose Drill bit set for metal precision metalworking, engineering, toolmaking, welding, deburring, jewelry making, or if you enjoy various DIY arts and crafts or hobbies such as wood carving. ★ After Sales Service If you have any questions about our micro drill bit set, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns within 24 business hours.
【Wood Carving Bits】Ideal for precision metalworking, engineering, tool making, welding, deburring, jewelry making, and hobbies such as various DIY arts and crafts or wood carving;wood carving bits are made of highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand the test of time .
【Rotary Tool Accessories Kit】The 20-Piece Wood Drill Bit Kit includes everything you need to cut, shape, grind, polish and remove sharp edges. And is compatible with ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic and even stone. The kit includes suitable for all types of cuts such as impellers, cylinders, cylinders, cones and needles.
【Professional Tools】Unlike similar products on the market, these engraved burrs reduce cutting time. Suitable for castings, implant tools, forging and finishing trimming, veining and weld cleaning in a variety of metallic and non-metallic dies.
【Cutting Tool Adaptability】Most die grinders and small rotary tools with three-jaw chucks for precise centering. Wide variety for fine detail work including cutting, engraving, grinding, polishing, trimming, deburring, chamfering, grooving, reaming, hollowing, bevelling, repairing, and Finishing.
【Easy Storage Gift Set】20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this Rotary Grinder Burr Bit Set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping.No more misplacing or losing your bits, they’re always available every time you need them.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:47 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.
